title: Wts: T206 mathewson portrait strong ex-exmt condition!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: Wts: T206 mathewson portrait strong ex-exmt condition!
posts.post_content: Beautiful card, piedmont 350 back. Upper left corner has a touch, but still squares up. Beautiful color and white borders. Please send me your email address for scans. Priced at $2000, or trade for high grade t206s. Thanks, also look at my cy young portrait as well. Both of these cards are incredible!
